items.content_html:
Chien-Fu Wu å³å»ºç”«

ğŸ“ª chienfuwu@gmail.com

Hello, I'm Chien-Fu Wu. I'm working on the analysis of the terminal structures and alteration phenomenon of the dsRNA alternavirus genomes. In the future, I will identify the protein functions of the alternavirus, and screen mycoviruses in Rhizoctonia solani strains collected from Taiwan. If there is any opportunity for collaboration, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Â
